title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB: The marking between the button and the list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table should contain a label so it can have a mnemonic. Multiple selection should be allowed as move up / down can be applied to more than one item. The signature preview must be a label that wraps. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
EB: The marking between the button and the list should be reduced. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog. The table should have a label with a mnemonic. The signature preview should wrap and be a label. Additionally, the signature preview should have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
SR: To reproduce the issue, change a parameter name to something very long. Check if the preview is cut off.
